name: OpenOptionsAutoCAD
shortdesc: Options which may be supplied when opening a AutoCAD file.

property.name: typename
property.shortdesc: The class name of the object.

property.name: globalScaleOption
property.shortdesc: How to scale the AutoCAD drawing on import (default: Fit Artboard)

property.name: globalScalePercent
property.shortdesc: Percentage scaling to apply globally on the AutoCAD drawing (default: 1.0)

property.name: unitScaleRatio
property.shortdesc: Ratio by which to scale while mapping the units (default: 1.0)

property.name: unit
property.shortdesc: Units to which to map (default: Millimeters)

property.name: selectedLayoutName
property.shortdesc: Name of layout in the AutoCAD drawing to import.

property.name: centerArtwork
property.shortdesc: To center the created artwork on the artboard (default: true)

property.name: mergeLayers
property.shortdesc: To merge the layers of the artwork (default: false)

property.name: scaleLineweights
property.shortdesc: To scale lineweights by the same amount as rest of the drawing (default: false)
